title: RST pin should
extract: December 2009) (Learn how and when to remove this template message) A power-on reset (PoR) generator is a microcontroller or microprocessor peripheral that generates a reset signal when power is applied to the device. It ensures that the device starts operating in a known state.
extract_html: December 2009) (Learn how and when to remove this template message) A power-on reset (PoR) generator is a microcontroller or microprocessor peripheral that generates a reset signal when power is applied to the device. It ensures that the device starts operating in a known state.
